message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $15,000. What do you think?
Alice, $15,000 is a bit out of my range. I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go higher than $12,000. Let me know what you think.
I understand that $12,000 is your maximum budget, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,500. What do you think?

Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to come down in price, but $13,500 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking to my original offer of $12,000.  Let me know if you're willing to accept that.
